function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Ceiling fans inhibiting the vertical mixing and dilution of virus-laden particles within the breathing zone","Impact":"Increased risk of virus transmission and airborne infection","Mitigation":"Use of alternative ventilation strategies in rooms where ceiling fans inhibit vertical mixing; consideration of virus-laden particle movement in ventilation design","Technologies":"Alternative ventilation designs, such as displacement ventilation, to enhance vertical mixing and dilution of virus-laden particles","People":"Occupants of buildings with ventilation strategies reliant on ceiling fans","Owner":"Building managers, architects, and engineers"},{"Description":"Uncertain effectiveness of air ionization technology in eliminating SARS-CoV-2 and potential production of by-products such as ozone","Impact":"Potential ineffective control of virus transmission and risks of harmful by-products in indoor air","Mitigation":"Thorough assessment of the effectiveness and potential by-products of air ionization technology before implementation; consideration of alternative air purification methods","Technologies":"Thorough efficacy testing for air ionization against SARS-CoV-2 and monitoring for harmful by-products; exploration of alternative air purification technologies","People":"Occupants of buildings where air ionization technology is deployed","Owner":"Facility managers, environmental health professionals, and building maintenance personnel"}]}
